Articles.Content: I just got the breaking ground DLC and was excited to give it a try. First thing I made was a simple prop plane, and couldn't wait to try it out. Only I found that no matter what I tried the engine wouldn't turn the prop. I then figured maybe I needed the control editor... only to discover it was as straight forwards as Lombard Street. Could Squad really not take a little time to add an in-game tutorial. I know I can Google the stuff, but it's just kinda annoying to be so ready to try out the new stuff, then realize I can't because it's so different to anything else in the game.
